name: RandomHexColor
0:
”Alexa, ask random hex color to tell me a random hex color.”
”Alexa, open random hex color and generate a hex color.”
”Alexa, ask random hex color to give me a random hexadecimal color.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random hex color
des:
With over 16 million hexadecimal color combinations, how could you ever choose a color?

Just ask Alexa for a hex color and one will be randomly generated for all your random hex-color needs!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
